name: iron_flesh
effect: Reduces all incoming physical damage by 2 points

name: nightmare_aura
effect: Any investigator within 10 yards must succeed in a Sanity check or lose 1d4 Sanity per 2 rounds

name: shadow_step
effect: Can move 10 feet as a free action.

name: frenzied_strikes
effect: Gains an extra melee attack if the enemy hits with their first attack in the same round

name: regeneration
effect: Regains 1 hit point per round unless damage is caused by fire, bleed, or poison.

name: mind_shatter
effect: Successful attacks impose a penalty die on the target’s next Intelligence or Willpower roll

name: bloodlust
effect: Gains an extra attack if an attack reduces more than 50% of an investigator’s health.

name: howling_scream
effect: Every investigator within earshot must pass a Power check or be stunned for 1 round

name: ancient_wrath
effect: Deal an additional 1d4 damage when below 50% health
